'''''Aiglos 21''''' is a regular Polish language issue of '''''[[Aiglos (journal)|Aiglos]]'''''.<ref>''Aiglos''' 21 official page in Polish http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/numer21.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref><ref>''Aiglos''' 21 official page in English http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/english/issue21.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref>
{{AiglosNav|20|22}}
==Contents==
{{AiglosTransl}}
* '''Cover Art'''
** ''Autumn Ent''
*** By: Joanna Cheda 'Niuchaczaus'

* '''Articles and essays'''
** "Frodo’s dreams"
*** By: Marek Gumkowski
** "Good sides of Sauron"
*** By: [[Helge Kåre Fauskanger]]
** "Who’s blowing?"
*** By: Maria Błaszkiewicz
** "Sauron’s war with the Elves 1693–1701. A draft monograph."
*** By: [[Michał Leśniewski|Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.']]
** "Representations of Queen Mab in English literature from Shakespeare to Susanna Clarke"
*** By: Bartłomiej Błaszkiewicz

* '''Fanfiction and poetry''' 
** ''Two halves''
*** By: Ula Kotwica 'Ariana'
** ''Palantír'' 
*** By: [[Jakub Tymiński|Jakub Tymiński 'Ominous']]

* '''Reviews and interviews'''
** An interview with [[Agnieszka Sylwanowicz|Agnieszka Sylwanowicz 'Evermind HS Took']]
*** By: Jakub Tymiński 'Ominous' 
** "About The Hobbit, joke and allegory once again – a polemic against Maria Błaszkiewicz’s article"
*** By: Tadeusz Andrzej Olszański 'Halbarad Dúnadan' 
** "A long-expected end" – a review of the extended DVD edition of ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''"
*** By: Agnieszka Sylwanowicz 'Evermind HS Took' 
** A review of the game ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]''
*** By: Krzysztof Mysiak 'Draugnimir' 
** "Tolkien in the context of his times a review of Dimitra Fimi’s book ''[[Tolkien, Race and Cultural History]]''"
*** By: Agnieszka Sylwanowicz 'Evermind HS Took' 
** "On laundry tickets, inspirations, fanfiction and collecting points. A few words about the publication of J.R.R. Tolkien’s ''[[The Story of Kullervo]]''"
*** By: Michał Leśniewski 'M.L.'
** "''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' for the eye, a review of Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull’s ''[[The Art of The Lord of the Rings]]''
*** By: Agnieszka Sylwanowicz 'Evermind HS Took' 

The issue contains also a hobbit genealogical crossword puzzle by Karolina Stopa-Olszanska 'Melinir' and Tolkien news from Poland and abroad.

* '''Illustrations'''
** By: Marta Aguado Garrido
** By: Jessica Albert ‘Sieskja’
** By: Joanna Cheda ‘Niuchaczaus’ (cover)
** By: Gerwell
** By: [[Catherine Karina Chmiel|'Kasiopea']]
** By: Līga Kļaviņa 
** By: lomacchi
** By: Righon
** By: [[Karolina Stopa-Olszańska|Karolina Stopa-Olszańska 'Melinir']]
** By: [[User:Sirielle|Karolina Węgrzyn 'Sirielle']] 
** By: Katarzyna Wojdak 'Avari'
** By: [[Peter Xavier Price]]
